Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Molecular Mechanisms of Pharmacological Action/Antioxidants
Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Physiological Effects of Drugs/Protective Agents/Antioxidants
Record.Description: Naturally occurring or synthetic substances that inhibit or retard the oxidation of a substance to which it is added. They counteract the harmful and damaging effects of oxidation in animal tissues.
